title: Updated CDC guidance says 3 feet of physical distancing is safe in schools
content:
1. Updated CDC guidance says 3 feet of physical distancing is safe in schools  CNN
  2. CDC shortens Covid social distancing guidelines for kids in school to 3 feet with masks  CNBC
  3. CDC to change school social distancing guidelines as metro Detroit schools deal with outbreaks  WXYZ-TV Detroit | Channel 7
  4. COVID science, CDC hints point to full-time, in-person school  Los Angeles Times
  5. CDC changes school guidance, allowing desks to be closer  The Associated Press
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 疾控中心最新指导意见称，学校内3英尺物理距离是安全的。
疾控中心最新指導意見稱，學校內3英尺物理距離是安全的。
